name: FNACC (Android)
description:
Before you start complaining in your head, I am also going to release this for PC.

This is FNACCC (not Five nights at Candy's Candy's Candy's)

It's a FNaF fan game made for android and soon going to be made for iOS.

Here are the controls:

Click on the side of the screen to rotate the camera

Click the blue button with an arrow to flip the camera up

Click the RED button with an arrow facing above to put the mask on

Click on the vents and hallway to flash a light towards the vent to see clearly.

INFO:

There are 3 blocks (black, blue, pink) that will try to capture you, prevent them for doing by the call instructions you will be getting upon starting.
